ccnget.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**
00002  * @file ccnget.c
00003  * Get one content item matching the name prefix and write it to stdout.
00004  * Written as test for ccn_get, but probably useful for debugging.
00005  *
00006  * A CCNx command-line utility.
00007  *
00008  * Copyright (C) 2009-2010 Palo Alto Research Center, Inc.
00009  *
00010  * This work is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under
00011  * the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2 as published by the
00012  * Free Software Foundation.
00013  * This work is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY
00014  * WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or
00015  * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License
00016  * for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public
00017  * License along with this program; if not, write to the
00018  * Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor,
00019  * Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA.
00020  */
00021 #include <stdio.h>
00022 #include <stdlib.h>
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 #include <unistd.h>
00025 #include <ccn/bloom.h>
00026 #include <ccn/ccn.h>
00027 #include <ccn/charbuf.h>
00028 #include <ccn/uri.h>
00029 
00030 static void
00031 usage(const char *progname)
00032 {
00033     fprintf(stderr,
00034             "%s [-a] [-c] ccnx:/a/b\n"
00035             "   Get one content item matching the name prefix and write it to stdout"
00036             "\n"
00037             "   -a - allow stale data\n"
00038             "   -c - content only, not full ccnb\n"
00039             "   -u - allow unverified content\n"
00040             "   -v - resolve version number\n",
00041             progname);
00042     exit(1);
00043 }
00044 
00045 int
00046 main(int argc, char **argv)
00047 {
00048     struct ccn *h = NULL;
00049     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
00050     struct ccn_charbuf *templ = NULL;
00051     struct ccn_charbuf *resultbuf = NULL;
00052     const char *arg = NULL;
00053     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pcobuf = { 0 };
00054     int res;
00055     int opt;
00056     int allow_stale = 0;
00057     int content_only = 0;
00058     const unsigned char *ptr;
00059     size_t length;
00060     int resolve_version = 0;
00061     const char *env_timeout = getenv("CCN_LINGER");
00062     int timeout_ms = 3000;
00063     int get_flags = 0;
00064     
00065     while ((opt = getopt(argc, argv, "hacuv")) != -1) {
00066         switch (opt) {
00067             case 'a':
00068                 allow_stale = 1;
00069                 break;
00070             case 'c':
00071                 content_only = 1;
00072                 break;
00073             case 'u':
00074                 get_flags |= CCN_GET_NOKEYWAIT;
00075                 break;
00076             case 'v':
00077                 if (resolve_version == 0)
00078                     resolve_version = CCN_V_HIGHEST;
00079                 else
00080                     resolve_version = CCN_V_HIGH;
00081                 break;
00082             case 'h':
00083             default:
00084                 usage(argv[0]);
00085         }
00086     }
00087     arg = argv[optind];
00088     if (arg == NULL)
00089         usage(argv[0]);
00090     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00091     res = ccn_name_from_uri(name, arg);
00092     if (res < 0) {
00093         fprintf(stderr, "%s: bad ccn URI: %s\n", argv[0], arg);
00094         exit(1);
00095     }
00096     if (argv[optind + 1] != NULL)
00097         fprintf(stderr, "%s warning: extra arguments ignored\n", argv[0]);
00098     h = ccn_create();
00099     res = ccn_connect(h, NULL);
00100     if (res < 0) {
00101         ccn_perror(h, "ccn_connect");
00102         exit(1);
00103     }
00104     if (res < 0) {
00105         fprintf(stderr, "%s: bad ccn URI: %s\n", argv[0], arg);
00106         exit(1);
00107     }
00108     if (env_timeout != NULL && (res = atoi(env_timeout)) > 0) {
00109                 timeout_ms = res * 1000;
00110     }
00111         if (allow_stale || env_timeout != NULL) {
00112         templ = ccn_charbuf_create();
00113         ccn_charbuf_append_tt(templ, CCN_DTAG_Interest, CCN_DTAG);
00114         ccn_charbuf_append_tt(templ, CCN_DTAG_Name, CCN_DTAG);
00115         ccn_charbuf_append_closer(templ); /* </Name> */
00116                 if (allow_stale) {
00117                         ccn_charbuf_append_tt(templ, CCN_DTAG_AnswerOriginKind, CCN_DTAG);
00118                         ccnb_append_number(templ,
00119                                                            CCN_AOK_DEFAULT | CCN_AOK_STALE);
00120                         ccn_charbuf_append_closer(templ); /* </AnswerOriginKind> */
00121                 }
00122                 if (env_timeout != NULL) {
00123                         /*
00124                          * Choose the interest lifetime so there are at least 3
00125                          * expressions (in the unsatisfied case).
00126                          */
00127                         unsigned char buf[3] = { 0 };
00128                         unsigned lifetime;
00129                         int i;
00130                         if (timeout_ms > 60000)
00131                                 lifetime = 30 << 12;
00132                         else {
00133                                 lifetime = timeout_ms * 2 / 5 * 4096 / 1000;
00134                         }
00135                         for (i = sizeof(buf) - 1; i >= 0; i--, lifetime >>= 8)
00136                                 buf[i] = lifetime & 0xff;
00137                         ccnb_append_tagged_blob(templ, CCN_DTAG_InterestLifetime, buf, sizeof(buf));
00138                 }
00139         ccn_charbuf_append_closer(templ); /* </Interest> */
00140     }
00141     resultbuf = ccn_charbuf_create();
00142     if (resolve_version != 0) {
00143         res = ccn_resolve_version(h, name, resolve_version, 500);
00144         if (res >= 0) {
00145             ccn_uri_append(resultbuf, name->buf, name->length, 1);
00146             fprintf(stderr, "== %s\n",
00147                             ccn_charbuf_as_string(resultbuf));
00148             resultbuf->length = 0;
00149         }
00150     }
00151     res = ccn_get(h, name, templ, timeout_ms, resultbuf, &pcobuf, NULL, get_flags);
00152     if (res >= 0) {
00153         ptr = resultbuf->buf;
00154         length = resultbuf->length;
00155         if (content_only)
00156             ccn_content_get_value(ptr, length, &pcobuf, &ptr, &length);
00157         if (length > 0)
00158             res = fwrite(ptr, length, 1, stdout) - 1;
00159     }
00160     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&resultbuf);
00161     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&templ);
00162     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00163     ccn_destroy(&h);
00164     exit(res < 0);
00165 }
